title: WATCH: The ultimate cycling path? Take your bike and cruise through water in Belgium
text:
Said to be one of the best experiences EVER - it was listed in Time Magazine's "World's 100 Greatest Places 2018" - cycling through water in Limburg, Belgium, at the ponds region of Bokrijk in De Wijers is one to add to your bucket list.

MAPPED: The ultimate adrenaline-soaked itinerary for South African thrill seekers

Watch the above video to experience a taste of this unexpected adrenaline rush.
